item.title: Should fans sing along in theaters during the "Wicked" movie?
item.description: Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande, AMC and fans react to the debate over in-theater singing during "Wicked."

item.title: Alice Brock, inspiration of Arlo Guthrie's "Alice's Restaurant," dead at 83
item.description: Alice Brock, whose Massachusetts-based eatery helped inspire Arlo Guthrie's deadpan Thanksgiving standard, "Alice's Restaurant," has died at age 83.

item.title: Trump selects Rep. Lori Chavez-DeRemer as Labor secretary
item.description: Republican Rep. Lori Chavez-DeRemer of Oregon, who narrowly lost her reelection bid earlier this month, received strong backing from union members in ...

item.title: Trump nominates Marty Makary, who opposed COVID vaccine mandates, to head FDA
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated a critic of COVID-19 health measures to lead the Food and Drug Administration.

item.title: Ernie Johnson, wife found healing by "unlocking" their late son's key collection
item.description: Ernie and Cheryl Johnson had planned to hold onto their late son Michael's quirky key collection forever. But then they met 6-year-old Cooper Kivett.
